content.name: Standing Orders
content.description:
Standing Orders adds a lightweight interface that lets you clone Repeat Orders trade queues from one of player's ship to any number of other player-owned ships.
[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2] [list] [*] Clone a ship’s running Repeat Orders (currently Single Buy/Sell) onto any selection of eligible targets in a single confirmation step. [*] Works only with [b]Container[/b] type of cargo. [*] Automatically scales cargo amounts to each target’s hold size while preserving wares, prices, and destinations. [/list] [h2][b]Requirements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]X4: Foundations[/b] 7.60 or newer (tested on 7.60 and 8.00). [*] [b]Mod Support APIs[/b] by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url] to be installed and enabled. Version [b]1.93[/b] and upper is required. [list] [*] It is available via Steam - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2042901274]SirNukes Mod Support APIs[/url] [*] Or via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/503]Mod Support APIs[/url] [/list] [/list] [h2][b]Installation[/b][/h2]
You can download the latest version via Steam client - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3596138453]Standing Orders[/url] Or you can do it via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/1871]Standing Orders[/url]
[h2][b]Usage[/b][/h2]
This mods adds a several context menu options to the map UI when you right-click on a player-owned ships.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/repeat_orders_example.png[/img]
[h2]Selecting Source Ship[/h2]
To select a source ship (the one whose Repeat Orders you want to clone), right-click on it in the map view and choose [b][∞]: Select as Source[/b] from the context menu. [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/select_as_source.png[/img]
You will get warning messages if source ship is invalid. Some examples: [list] [*] the selected ship does not have any valid cargo. [/list] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/no_valid_cargo.png[/img] [list] [*] the selected ship has no active Repeat Orders enabled. [/list] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/no_repeat_orders_enabled.png[/img]
If the source ship is valid, map will be centered on it and ship will be selected on a map.
[h2]Selecting Target Ships for Cloning Orders[/h2]
To clone the Repeat Orders from the selected source ship to other player-owned ships, simple select them on a map or in the list, then right-click and choose [b][∞]: Clone Standing Orders from <source ship>[/b] from the context menu.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/clone_context_menu.png[/img]
Again, you will get warning messages if no valid target ships are selected.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/no_valid_targets.png[/img]
[h2]Confirming Cloning[/h2]
After selecting valid target ships, you will get a confirmation dialog showing the summary of the cloning operation.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/clone_confirmation_dialog.png[/img]
You can confirm or cancel the operation. In addition, you can [b]Deselect as Source[/b] ship if you want to choose a different source ship.
[h2]Deselecting Source Ship[/h2]
To deselect the current source ship, right-click on it in the map view and choose [b][∞]: Deselect as Source[/b] from the context menu.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/deselect_source_ship.png[/img]
[h2]Result of Cloning[/h2]
After confirming the cloning operation, the selected target ships will receive the cloned Repeat Orders from the source ship.
[h3][b]Before Cloning[/b][/h3]
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/first_target_before_cloning.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/second_target_before_cloning.png[/img]
[h3][b]After Cloning[/b][/h3]
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/first_target_after_cloning.png[/img] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-StandingOrders/refs/heads/main/docs/images/second_target_after_cloning.png[/img]
You can compare it with example of the source ship's Repeat Orders shown at the beginning of [b]Usage[/b] chapter.
[h2][b]Video[/b][/h2]
Video demonstration of the Standing Orders. Version 1.00 [previewyoutube=lTWG6vBWIhc;full][/previewyoutube]
